strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_NEMMANDO_MASTERY_DESC: 作为复仇指挥官，在季风难度下通关游戏或抹除自己。
strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_NEMMANDO_GRANDMASTERY_DE: 作为复仇指挥官，在台风难度下通关游戏或抹除自己。
strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_NEMMANDO_SINGLETAP_DESC: As Nemesis Commando, defeat Commando's vestige.
strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_NEMMANDO_BOSSATTACK_DESC: As Nemesis Commando, kill an enemy with 10 stacks of gouge or more.
